DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate whether Folrex, could improve the motor recovery of the upper extremity after stroke in comparison with placebo during 4 weeks of treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Folrex in the Superior Extremity Rehabilitation After Acute Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: Periodical measures of the motor recovery, of the upper extremity, by Fugl-Meyer score, it will be done at the beginning, at fifth day and at month. Each value will be compare to evaluate whether the groups of patient improve.
DOC.criteria: Patients with acute stroke < 24 hours. Patients with impairment up to 4 on NIHSS scale. Family support. Informed consent. Presence of another disease not well controlled. Patient with dementia.
